sentences.en: Factory managers understate their potential output.
sentences.cn: 工厂的管理人员少报他们的潜在产量.

sentences.en: It would be a mistake to understate the seriousness of the problem.
sentences.cn: 对该问题的严重性轻描淡写是错误的。

sentences.en: She refuses on principle to understate her income for taxation purposes.
sentences.cn: 他出于道德上的动机,不愿为了少纳税而少报收入.

sentences.en: The inflation numbers probably understate the degree of overheating.
sentences.cn: 通胀数据可能还不足说明经济过热的程度.

sentences.en: The press have tended to understate the extent of the problem.
sentences.cn: 媒体想淡化问题的严重程度。

sentences.en: This approach seems to have worked well, if I may be allowed to understate the obvious.
sentences.cn: 这项方针似乎一直行之有效.对于这众所周知的事实, 我想我只须轻描淡写就够了.

words.tran_cn: 低调的；朴素的；轻描淡写的；不夸张的
保守的陈述；不充分的陈述；有保留的陈述

trans.tran_cn: 保守地说， 轻描淡写地说
trans.tran_en: to describe something in a way that makes it seem less important or serious than it really is

trans.tran_cn: 保守地说，有意轻描淡写
少说，少报，有意识地轻描淡写
